title: Best 1v1 champions in ARAM
body: Our school has made a 1v1 tournament and i was thinking what are the best champions/keystone mastery to use. i plan to win by getting 100 cs or first tower while playing as safe as i can. everyone will be most likely banning cait, lucian, and heimerdinger. any cheese strats aswell?

replies.body: Just play who your best with.
if you have and can play Jhin, from experience he's pretty op in aram.
Sivir. Grab some mana regen and farm for daiz from complete safety

I was in a 1v1 tournament about a month ago- I had banned more or less your selection of common bans, but it had escaped my mind that I had forgotten to ban {{champion:203}} . I was playing the almighty Yorick, but I still lost...

Not quite sure about the masteries or runes, but Kindred has in-built sustain, a low cooldown dash and a short but heavy slow. Her death-preventing ultimate also helps in all-in situations leaning against your favor. You'll probably be able to reach 100 cs easily without taking too much damage, and can even harass the opponent if they are out of place.
